website_summaries.verdict: Build an impressive water strider mech with this 494-piece set based on the LEGO Ninjago movie.
pros: Strider has rapid shooters and posable legs
Includes 4 minifigures: Nya, Kai, Puffer and Shark Army Thug
Measures 7"H x 11"L x 11"W. For ages 8 to 14
cons: Connections are a little fragile, so it might come apart during play

customer_reviews.title: Nice set. Good figure selection
customer_reviews.text: Nice set. Good figure selection. Build was repetitive, building the legs 4 times. But set looks great assembled. Legs are locked in place at the center section, so the legs aren't as poseable as they could have been. And the cockpit screen was not hinged, which I personally hate in models. Sides of the cockpit aren't held in place by enough studs, so they come lose too easy when the screen is not on the model. But otherwise, a very nice set.
customer_reviews.author: Miles A.

customer_reviews.title: LEGO ninjago
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old absolutely loves legos and LEGO ninjago has been a favorite lately. He’s able to put these together himself with very little help. This particular set comes with 7 bags including some LEGO men. They are really cool and will keep you busy for hours! Would definitely recommend these to any LEGO lover!
customer_reviews.author: miss218

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces and sent it back
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift to my son for his birthday as he wants all the ninjas. Sadly when we opened the first bag we noticed it had 2 Kai heads and helmet, but it was missing his entire body. Then we had Nya's body but no head, mask, or helmet. That's as far as we got as i didn't want to waste hours trying to put something together that might be missing more pieces. Not to mention that the box was missing normal lego information on the box like the number of pieces, which is typical of knock off legos. Im not convinced we received an authentic lego and sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: S Boucher

customer_reviews.title: Give yourself and co-builders plenty of time.
customer_reviews.text: 6 yr old grandson went crazy over this. Be advised that there are over 400 parts and many are very small. It took a total of 4 hours to put it together but that may have been related to a 6 yr old in the control lead. It shoots little blue clear "missiles" that can get lost very easily if not aimed in a direction that makes them easy to find. Avoid carpet. Great fun and well built when finished. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Granma

customer_reviews.title: 7 Year old
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 7 year old who for the most part did a fair job building on his own but the lego set isn’t the clearest on instructions when it came to the legs. With some help, he was able to get through it. He was very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: thedharmalife

customer_reviews.title: Good LEGO set for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a LEGO set for a gift, and this one was simply the biggest bang for the buck. It has a lot of pieces, and makes a pretty impressive robot thing that any kid would love. It is interesting that it is only about half the price, on average around the web, as any other LEGO sets of comparable size. Can't really figure out how they price the things, but this was a good deal!
customer_reviews.author: Radio127

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME SAUCE!
customer_reviews.text: So awesome and my boys have gotten loads an hours of fun!!! One of those boys is my husband so there’s that, lol. He puts them together and our four and six-year-olds tear them apart and create new awesome thing-a-bobs from it! Legos! It was really cold while it lasted! Luckily it comes with a nice booklet so my husband can put it back together again! Ha.
customer_reviews.author: SassyAmazoner!

customer_reviews.title: Son Mostly Loves It
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 11 year old son. He was stoked and put it together in just a few hours the first night. We give it a 4/5 stars because he says that the missiles fall off of it way too easily. If he hardly touches it they fall off. He says that then it's hard to get them back on because as he puts one on, the other one falls off.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Hervey

customer_reviews.title: It’s a good project especially if you consider the price.
customer_reviews.text: It’s inexpensive, I paid less than $24. It’s very cool looking when completed. The only thing I like to improve is they should include another joint at the top of each legs. As of right now, it’s basically a fixed X shape bottom with four legs join to it. But if you consider the price, it was a fun project.
customer_reviews.author: F. Szeto

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat repetitive build, but a good set.
customer_reviews.text: I've got a soft spot for 'mech kits, even if I don't much care for the Ninjago theme. It's an okay build -- the vehicle core is the interesting part, and the four legs are all identical, so there's a bit of repetition. My kids love this one and the legs are sturdy enough where they're not pulling them off every time they try to change the pose. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: D. Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old daughter bought this and is glad she did. She enjoyed putting it together and said she would have been disappointed if she didn't have to assemble the legs (I guess previous reviews said it was a bummer they had to assemble the legs?) after all...part of the fun of Legos is building them. She plays with it often :)
customer_reviews.author: SavedByGrace

customer_reviews.title: Great for Ninjago Movie lovers
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this as a gift for a 9 year-old friend, and it was the perfect choice! This is a great option for LEGO Ninjago movie fans since it's more unique than a lot of other options. The recipient also loved the included minifigs. Since this is a good-sized set, it makes an impressive gift!
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: This is just an amazing build. Most connections are secure
customer_reviews.text: This is just an amazing build. Most connections are secure, except the flags do sometimes come off. The only major issue is that the hip? joint isn't an actual joint, so it can't be posed anywhere that isn't flat - but I've heard there are instructions online to replace with a more flexible joint.
customer_reviews.author: MamaLLama

customer_reviews.title: Legos Rock
customer_reviews.text: This thing was a PAIN to build but it’s a lot of fun for my son. He really enjoys them. I was annoyed with building it. Let me tell ya I said a few words. But eventually got it done and together and he couldn’t be happier
customer_reviews.author: Michellci B.

customer_reviews.title: LEGO fans -- can't go wrong with this!
customer_reviews.text: LEGO's - great for the Lego kid in your life. My only problem is knowing which ones to buy so he gives me screen shots and Wa-la!! Three Christmas gifts ordered!! He has two of the three already built!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Sipes

customer_reviews.title: Genius Lego Creation
customer_reviews.text: A bit complicated for age range, but price is fantastic at $24. The Lego engineers / designers went nuts with this one, great features!
customer_reviews.author: PDXreview

customer_reviews.title: My 8 year old grandson got this for his birthday ...
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old grandson got this for his birthday and put it together himself, which took a very long time, but it was worth the effort and he was proud of his accomplishment. The project includes 4 packets of parts to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Mother Goose

customer_reviews.title: and My newly turned 7 year old enjoyed putting this together and had several great adventures and ...

product_meta.title: LEGO Ninjago Movie Water Strider 70611 Building Kit (494 Piece)
product_meta.description: Launch into battle against the shark army and pretend to walk on water and climb walls with this awesome THE LEGO NINJAGO MOVIE mech. The Water Strider features a 360-degree rotating minifigure cockpit, 6-stud rapid shooter and 4 posable legs and feet to create powerful battle poses. The set also includes 4 minifigures with assorted weapons to add to the ninja vs. shark army role-play battle options.
feature_bullets: Build a mech with 360-degree rotating minifigure cockpit, 6-stud rapid shooter and 4 posable legs!
Featured in THE LEGO NINJAGO MOVIE
Includes 4 minifigures: Nya, Kai, Puffer and Shark Army Thug
LEGO Ninjago building toys are compatible with all LEGO construction sets for creative building
Measures over 7” high, 11” long and 11” wide
494 pieces – For boys and girls between the ages of 8 and 14

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars474 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
